column5: We are heading up to Northern Light lake from Minnesota next week, and we are looking to pick up some groceries (potatoes, onions, possibly beer). Does anyone know if there are any around this area? Or possibly a resort near by that would sell these items?

Hi Dave, You can either stop in Kakabeka at Odina's Grocery store and get your food items there and your beer at the liquor store (just a little farther down the "street" on your right. Or you can bypass that and head right to Whitefish Store. It'll be on your way to Northern Lights Lake. You won't miss it. Roger Mayer.
